Posts.Title: Scared To Look At My Surgical Site ibjennifer125 pshelton

Posts.Content: Jul 6, 2009 05:49PM ibjennifer125 wrote: Needless to say I want all this to go away.  The scar site is laying heavy on my mind as it never has before so I will need to look soon. My sister changed my dressings after surgery so she is the only one who's seen it and she said it's not as bad I think it's going to be, but to call her if I want someone to help me look. My wonderful husband offered too, but I can't go there yet with him. I think I'll do it alone...
Posts.Title: Scared To Look At My Surgical Site ibjennifer125 pshelton

Posts.Content: Jul 5, 2009 02:23PM ibjennifer125 wrote: Thanks so much for the encouragement. I keep thinking one day I will fling my shirt off in front of the mirror and get on with it.....other days I think I will not look ever since I am having reconstruction anyway.  I still have my medi port and folks I can't even bear to look at THAT. My oncologist even told me last week I simply have to take this step. All the time I'm thinking " you're a guy...what do you know about it?"
